column3: Social media or communications platforms blocked
column4: Political, social, or religious content blocked
column7: New law or directive increasing censorship or punisment passed
column8: New law or directive increasing surveillance or restricting anonymity passed
column9: Blogger or ICT user arrested, imprisoned, or in prolonged detention for political or social content
column10: Blogger or ICT user physically attacked or killed (including in custody)
column11: Technical attacks against government critics or human rights organizations
